name: fifth_dawn
description: Fifth Dawn package — sunburst, entwine, five-color payoffs, and flexible artifact/counter synergies.

Artifact: Sunburst (This enters the battlefield with a charge counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.)
As long as {SOURCE} has three or more charge counters on it, artifact creatures you control get +1/+1.
{ACTIVATED_COST}: Add one mana of any color for each charge counter on {SOURCE}.
Imprint — When {SOURCE} enters the battlefield, you may exile a nonartifact card from your hand. Spells that share a color with the imprinted card have entwine {X}.
Creature: Sunburst (This enters with a +1/+1 counter on it for each color of mana spent to cast it.)
{TRIGGER_INTRO}for each color among permanents you control, put a +1/+1 counter on {SOURCE}.

Instant: Choose one — Target creature gets +{X}/+{X} until end of turn; or you gain {X} life. Entwine {1}{W} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)
Sorcery: Choose one — Create two 1/1 Myr tokens; or destroy target artifact. Entwine {2}{W}.

Instant: Choose one — Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}; or return target creature to its owner's hand. Entwine {2}{U}.
Sorcery: Choose one — Draw two cards; or artifacts you control gain hexproof until your next turn. Entwine {2}{U}.

Instant: Choose one — Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn; or return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand. Entwine {2}{B}.
Sorcery: Choose one — Each opponent loses 2 life; or destroy target nonartifact creature. Entwine {2}{B}.

Instant: Choose one — {SOURCE} deals 3 damage to any target; or gain control of target artifact until end of turn. Untap it. It gains haste until end of turn. Entwine {2}{R}.
Sorcery: Choose one — Create two 1/1 Myr tokens with haste; or destroy target artifact. Entwine {2}{R}.

Instant: Choose one — Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn; or destroy target artifact. Entwine {2}{G}.
Sorcery: Choose one — Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle; or create a 3/3 Golem token. Entwine {2}{G}.

TRIGGER_INTRO: At the beginning of your end step,
IMPRINT_EFFECT: You may play the imprinted card as long as it remains exiled.
Spells you cast that share a card type with the imprinted card cost {1} less to cast.
{SOURCE} has the imprinted card's activated abilities.
{SOURCE} gets +2/+2 as long as the imprinted card is a creature card.
You may copy the imprinted card's text box. If you do, you may choose new targets for the copy.
CHARGE_COUNTER_EFFECT: {SOURCE} has '{T}, Remove a charge counter from this: Add one mana of any color.'
Remove a charge counter from {SOURCE}: Draw a card.
Remove a charge counter from {SOURCE}: It deals 1 damage to any target.
Remove a charge counter from {SOURCE}: Target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
Remove a charge counter from {SOURCE}: Scry 1.
SPELLBOMB_EFFECT: Sacrifice {SOURCE}: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn.
Sacrifice {SOURCE}: Return target creature to its owner's hand.
Sacrifice {SOURCE}: Creatures you control get +1/+0 until end of turn.
Sacrifice {SOURCE}: Exile target artifact or enchantment.
AURA_VERB: enchanted permanent is an artifact in addition to its other types
